normalised: Mumbai: Are you really seeing the complete picture on your social media? Follower analytics are becoming the thing, especially for influencers chasing those brand deals. Forget just vanity metrics like likes, think deeper!

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are Your Followers Real, Yaar?**
normalised: Doctor Sharma at I I T-Delhi emphasized the need for robust follower analysis tools in a recent workshop.
